Testing vcvtps2pd instruction
---------------------------

Testing 128-bit version:
Input:  : 0.000000 -0.000000 
Output: : 0.000000 -0.000000 
Hex:    : 0x0000000000000000 0x8000000000000000 

Input:  : 1.000000 -1.000000 
Output: : 1.000000 -1.000000 
Hex:    : 0x3ff0000000000000 0xbff0000000000000 

Input:  : 123.456001 -123.456001 
Output: : 123.456001 -123.456001 
Hex:    : 0x405edd2f20000000 0xc05edd2f20000000 

Input:  : inf -inf 
Output: : inf -inf 
Hex:    : 0x7ff0000000000000 0xfff0000000000000 

Input:  : nan -nan 
Output: : nan -nan 
Hex:    : 0x7ff8000000000000 0xfff8000000000000 

Input:  : 0.000000 -0.000000 
Output: : 0.000000 -0.000000 
Hex:    : 0x380b38fb80000000 0xb80b38fb80000000 

Input:  : 340282346638528859811704183484516925440.000000 -340282346638528859811704183484516925440.000000 
Output: : 340282346638528859811704183484516925440.000000 -340282346638528859811704183484516925440.000000 
Hex:    : 0x47efffffe0000000 0xc7efffffe0000000 


Testing 256-bit version:
Input:  : 0.000000 -0.000000 1.000000 -1.000000 
Output: : 0.000000 -0.000000 1.000000 -1.000000 
Hex:    : 0x0000000000000000 0x8000000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 0xbff0000000000000 

Input:  : 123.456001 -123.456001 inf -inf 
Output: : 123.456001 -123.456001 inf -inf 
Hex:    : 0x405edd2f20000000 0xc05edd2f20000000 0x7ff0000000000000 0xfff0000000000000 

Input:  : nan -nan 0.000000 -0.000000 
Output: : nan -nan 0.000000 -0.000000 
Hex:    : 0x7ff8000000000000 0xfff8000000000000 0x380b38fb80000000 0xb80b38fb80000000 

Input:  : 340282346638528859811704183484516925440.000000 -340282346638528859811704183484516925440.000000 0.002001 0.000000 
Output: : 340282346638528859811704183484516925440.000000 -340282346638528859811704183484516925440.000000 0.002001 0.000000 
Hex:    : 0x47efffffe0000000 0xc7efffffe0000000 0x3f60636020000000 0x3705000000000000 

Tests completed
